SELECT p.prj_uni_no, p.prj_nm, p.subsp_yn, p.exdt, pm.partici_memb_uni_no, pm.memb_uni_no, pm.att_no, pm.nnm, pm.grd, FIND_CODE_NAME(pm.grd) AS CD, pm.partici_yn, pm.prj_pubc_id, pm.dept, pm.pos, c.pay_dt
FROM prj p JOIN prj_partici_memb pm on p.prj_uni_no = pm.prj_uni_no LEFT OUTER JOIN pay c ON c.pay_uni_no=p.pay_uni_no WHERE pm.partici_yn = 'Y' AND pm.memb_uni_no = #{membUniNo}

SELECT PARTICI_MEMB_UNI_NO, PRJ_UNI_NO, MEMB_UNI_NO, ATT_NO, NNM, GRD, FIND_CODE_NAME(GRD) AS CD, PARTICI_YN, PRJ_PUBC_ID , DEPT , POS
FROM prj_partici_memb pm
WHERE pm.prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo} AND pm.partici_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY pm.partici_memb_uni_no
SELECT count(*) FROM prj_partici_memb WHERE prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo} AND partici_yn = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM prj LEFT OUTER JOIN pay ON prj.pay_uni_no=pay.pay_uni_no WHERE prj.prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo}

SELECT partici_memb_uni_no, prj_uni_no, memb_uni_no, att_no, nnm, grd, partici_yn, prj_pubc_id, dept, pos, FIND_CODE_NAME(GRD) AS CD, cnt_post(partici_memb_uni_no, #{fromDt}, #{toDt}) postcnt, cnt_reply(partici_memb_uni_no, #{fromDt}, #{toDt}) replycnt, cnt_chat(partici_memb_uni_no, #{fromDt}, #{toDt}) chatcnt FROM prj_partici_memb WHERE prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo} and partici_yn='Y'
SELECT COUNT(grd) memCnt, FIND_CODE_NAME(grd) cd FROM prj_partici_memb WHERE prj_uni_no = #{prjUniNo} and partici_yn='Y' GROUP BY grd ORDER BY grd
